title: Autoimmunity and inflammation with Clint Paddison
description:
In Episode #154 we hear from Clint Paddison on his personal journey with Rheumatoid Arthritis and the ways in which he has changed his lifestyle to reduce inflammation, become less reliant on drugs and ultimately enjoy a high quality of life.

*Note: This episode is primarily focused on Clint's personal experience. His program, and the reviews below, go through the science looking at what (and how) dietary changes affect rheumatoid arthritis.

Resources:
2017 Review on Rheumatoid Arthritis and Diet
2019 Review on Rheumatoid Arthritis and Diet
The Paddison Program
